page.title: 12Billingham Town Centre
page.content: The shopping Centre was built with plenty of space between the shops. There is a bandstand, aspiral ramp to get to the upper shopping level, a playground with slides for children and seats. The Forum Leisure Centre was opened in 1967. It has sports facilities and a theatre. Planners from different towns came to visit Billlingham. The Billingham Technical College is next to John Whitehead Park. This was named after the Clerk to the Council. In the town centre is a grey and black statue of a family. It was unvieled by Her Majesty Queen Elizabeth II on the 19th of October 1967.
